thread.title: Wendy L. Schoen, Esq., M.B.A., Is Recognized By Continental Who's Who As A Pinnacle Professional
thread.title_full: Wendy L. Schoen, Esq., M.B.A., Is Recognized By Continental Who's Who As A Pinnacle Professional

title: Wendy L. Schoen, Esq., M.B.A., Is Recognized By Continental Who's Who As A Pinnacle Professional
text:
Wendy L. Schoen, Esq., M.B.A., Is Recognized By Continental Who's Who As A Pinnacle Professional By PR Newswire | 08/13/15 - 01:59 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK , Aug. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Wendy L. Schoen, Esq. , M.B.A., is recognized by Continental Who's Who as a Pinnacle Professional in the field of Legal Services as a result of her role as CEO and Managing Partner of Schoen Legal Search. A seasoned legal and search professional with over two decades of experience, Wendy works closely in the areas of business planning, corporate governance, recruiting, permanent placement, executive search, talent acquisition, legal writing and more. Furthermore, Wendy is a member of the National Association of Professional Women where she was recognized as a VIP Woman of The Year. Outside of the office, Wendy enjoys travel, reading and playing golf. During the course of her education and training, she received her J.D. from the Boston University School of Law as well as an MBA in Finance/Hospital Administration from the University of Chicago . Wendy also graduated Cum Laude with a Bachelor's degree in Psychology/Sociology from Washington University . For more information, please visit www.schoenlegal.com Contact: Robert Basilin , 516-825-5634, pr@continentalwhoswho.com To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wendy-l-schoen-esq-mba-is-recognized-by-continental-whos-who-as-a-pinnacle-professional-300128276.html SOURCE Continental Who's Who Copyright 2011 PR Newswire.
